Package workshop.security

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmployeesAuthenticationProvider  
    EmployeesDetailsService
    Special class for providing the UserDetails for the Spring Security process with the help of EmployeesDao
    ExternalAuthenticationFailureHandler
    First intended to obtain HttpRequest 'referer' header to redirect back to page a User has tried to log in to.
    JwtAuthenticationFilter
    Now works with cookies only.
    JwtUtils  
    LoginAuthenticationFilter
    Superclass in its constructor uses "super(new AntPathRequestMatcher("/login", "POST"))" to set the path to trigger
    SecurityUtils  
    UserAuditorAware
    Class is configured as a bean in the SecurityConfiguration.class.
    UserDetailsEmployee
    This implementation is intended to give an Employee object (eg for Trackable.setModified purpose, etc).
    UserDetailsUser  
    UsersAuthenticationProvider  
    UsersDetailsService  
    WorkshopAuthenticationManager  
    WorkshopPermissionEvaluator
    {@literal Class for analyzing methodSecurity permissions by, e.g
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InternalAuthority
    Don't use this Enums in bean's or classes initializers or constructors!
